comment: OMG THATS WHAT I SAID! *MIND BLOWN*
amr:

comment: : French President Francois Hollande says apparently no survivors" in Germanwings crash, at least passengers on the plane
amr:
# ::snt : French President Francois Hollande says apparently no survivors" in Germanwings crash, at least passengers on the plane
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Francois"
                  :op2 "Holland")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "France"))
                  :ARG2 (p2 / president)))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (p3 / person
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0-of (s2 / survive-01
                        :ARG1 (c2 / crash-01
                              :ARG1 (a2 / aircraft-type
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Germanwings"))))
                  :ARG1-of (a3 / appear-02))
            :op2 (p4 / passenger
                  :quant (a4 / at-least)
                  :location (p5 / plane))))
